title: Medium risk - voltage fluctuation with suspicious HMI activity
description: Simulate repeated voltage fluctuations on Feeder F-12 combined with several failed HMI login attempts from an external IP to produce a Medium risk incident.

recommendations: Increase telemetry sampling for FEEDER-F12 to 1s for the next 15 minutes
Inspect voltage regulator and power factor equipment at Substation KPL-03
Review HMI access logs and block suspicious IP 196.1.2.3
If fluctuations exceed 15% or persist beyond 30 minutes, escalate to field inspection
